title: Sinn Fein Leader's Questioning Dredges Memories Of 'Troubles'
teaser: Gerry Adams, a leader of Sinn Fein, was questioned in Northern Ireland in connection with an infamous murder 42 years ago. The investigation threatens to impact the fragile peace agreement there.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
